substitution.amendedText: Ham. Nay then I have en eye for you, if you love me hold not off.

the paragon of animals; and yet to me what is this quintessence of dust?

and the lady shall say her mind freely,

substitution.copyText: Ham. How chances it they travel? their residence both in reputation and profit was better both ways.
